DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to identify predictors of disease in patients with hyperparathyroidism (HPTH) who undergo surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Variables That Are Correlated to Developing Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia (MEN) and Pancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors (PNET)
DOC.detailed_description: Researchers aim to identify somatic mutations and inherited genetic variants which may help predict the development of PNET in patients with hyperparathyroidism.
DOC.criteria: 1. MEN1 patients who have undergone parathyroidectomy and did not develop PNET. 2. MEN1 patients who have undergone parathyroidectomy and had surgical removal of PNET.
